00032 struct btMprCollisionDescription
00033 {
00034     btVector3   m_firstDir;
00035     int                 m_maxGjkIterations;
00036     btScalar    m_maximumDistanceSquared;
00037     btScalar    m_gjkRelError2;
00038    
00039     btMprCollisionDescription()
00040     :   m_firstDir(0,1,0),
00041         m_maxGjkIterations(1000),
00042         m_maximumDistanceSquared(1e30f),
00043         m_gjkRelError2(1.0e-6)
00044     {
00045     }
00046     virtual ~btMprCollisionDescription()
00047     {
00048     }
00049 };

00051 struct btMprDistanceInfo
00052 {
00053     btVector3   m_pointOnA;
00054     btVector3   m_pointOnB;
00055     btVector3   m_normalBtoA;
00056     btScalar    m_distance;

00059 #ifdef __cplusplus
00060 #define BT_MPR_SQRT sqrtf
00061 #else
00062 #define BT_MPR_SQRT sqrt
00063 #endif
00064 #define BT_MPR_FMIN(x, y) ((x) < (y) ? (x) : (y))
00065 #define BT_MPR_FABS fabs
00066 
00067 #define BT_MPR_TOLERANCE 1E-6f
00068 #define BT_MPR_MAX_ITERATIONS 1000

00070 struct _btMprSupport_t 
00071 {
00072     btVector3 v;  
00073     btVector3 v1; 
00074     btVector3 v2;

00076 typedef struct _btMprSupport_t btMprSupport_t;

00078 struct _btMprSimplex_t 
00079 {
00080     btMprSupport_t ps[4];
00081     int last;

00108 {
00109     return s->last + 1;

00113 inline const btMprSupport_t* btMprSimplexPoint(const btMprSimplex_t* s, int idx)
00114 {
00115     // here is no check on boundaries
00116     return &s->ps[idx];
00117 }

00120 {
00121     *d = *s;

00124 inline void btMprSimplexSet(btMprSimplex_t *s, size_t pos, const btMprSupport_t *a)
00125 {
00126     btMprSupportCopy(s->ps + pos, a);
00127 }

00130 inline void btMprSimplexSwap(btMprSimplex_t *s, size_t pos1, size_t pos2)
00131 {
00132     btMprSupport_t supp;
00133 
00134     btMprSupportCopy(&supp, &s->ps[pos1]);
00135     btMprSupportCopy(&s->ps[pos1], &s->ps[pos2]);
00136     btMprSupportCopy(&s->ps[pos2], &supp);
00137 }

00140 inline int btMprIsZero(float val)
00141 {
00142     return BT_MPR_FABS(val) < FLT_EPSILON;
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 
00147 inline int btMprEq(float _a, float _b)
00148 {
00149     float ab;
00150     float a, b;
00151 
00152     ab = BT_MPR_FABS(_a - _b);
00153     if (BT_MPR_FABS(ab) < FLT_EPSILON)
00154         return 1;
00155 
00156     a = BT_MPR_FABS(_a);
00157     b = BT_MPR_FABS(_b);
00158     if (b > a){
00159         return ab < FLT_EPSILON * b;
00160     }else{
00161         return ab < FLT_EPSILON * a;
00162     }
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00166 inline int btMprVec3Eq(const btVector3* a, const btVector3 *b)
00167 {
00168     return btMprEq((*a).x(), (*b).x())
00169             && btMprEq((*a).y(), (*b).y())
00170             && btMprEq((*a).z(), (*b).z());
00171 }

00183 template <typename btConvexTemplate>
00184 inline void btFindOrigin(const btConvexTemplate& a, const btConvexTemplate& b, const btMprCollisionDescription& colDesc,btMprSupport_t *center)
00185 {
00186 
00187         center->v1 = a.getObjectCenterInWorld();
00188     center->v2 = b.getObjectCenterInWorld();
00189     center->v = center->v1 - center->v2;
00190 }
00191 
00192 inline void btMprVec3Set(btVector3 *v, float x, float y, float z)
00193 {
00194         v->setValue(x,y,z);
00195 }
00196 
00197 inline void btMprVec3Add(btVector3 *v, const btVector3 *w)
00198 {
00199         *v += *w;
00200 }
00201 
00202 inline void btMprVec3Copy(btVector3 *v, const btVector3 *w)
00203 {
00204     *v = *w;
00205 }
00206 
00207 inline void btMprVec3Scale(btVector3 *d, float k)
00208 {
00209     *d *= k;
00210 }
00211 
00212 inline float btMprVec3Dot(const btVector3 *a, const btVector3 *b)
00213 {
00214     float dot;
00215 
00216         dot = btDot(*a,*b);
00217     return dot;
00218 }

00221 inline float btMprVec3Len2(const btVector3 *v)
00222 {
00223     return btMprVec3Dot(v, v);
00224 }
00225 
00226 inline void btMprVec3Normalize(btVector3 *d)
00227 {
00228     float k = 1.f / BT_MPR_SQRT(btMprVec3Len2(d));
00229     btMprVec3Scale(d, k);
00230 }

00232 inline void btMprVec3Cross(btVector3 *d, const btVector3 *a, const btVector3 *b)
00233 {
00234         *d = btCross(*a,*b);
00235         
00236 }

00239 inline void btMprVec3Sub2(btVector3 *d, const btVector3 *v, const btVector3 *w)
00240 {
00241         *d = *v - *w;
00242 }
00243 
00244 inline void btPortalDir(const btMprSimplex_t *portal, btVector3 *dir)
00245 {
00246     btVector3 v2v1, v3v1;
00247 
00248     btMprVec3Sub2(&v2v1, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,
00249                        &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);
00250     btMprVec3Sub2(&v3v1, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,
00251                        &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);
00252     btMprVec3Cross(dir, &v2v1, &v3v1);
00253     btMprVec3Normalize(dir);
00254 }
00255 
00256 
00257 inline int portalEncapsulesOrigin(const btMprSimplex_t *portal,
00258                                        const btVector3 *dir)
00259 {
00260     float dot;
00261     dot = btMprVec3Dot(dir, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);
00262     return btMprIsZero(dot) || dot > 0.f;
00263 }
00264 
00265 inline int portalReachTolerance(const btMprSimplex_t *portal,
00266                                      const btMprSupport_t *v4,
00267                                      const btVector3 *dir)
00268 {
00269     float dv1, dv2, dv3, dv4;
00270     float dot1, dot2, dot3;
00271 
00272     // find the smallest dot product of dir and {v1-v4, v2-v4, v3-v4}
00273 
00274     dv1 = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v, dir);
00275     dv2 = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v, dir);
00276     dv3 = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v, dir);
00277     dv4 = btMprVec3Dot(&v4->v, dir);
00278 
00279     dot1 = dv4 - dv1;
00280     dot2 = dv4 - dv2;
00281     dot3 = dv4 - dv3;
00282 
00283     dot1 = BT_MPR_FMIN(dot1, dot2);
00284     dot1 = BT_MPR_FMIN(dot1, dot3);
00285 
00286     return btMprEq(dot1, BT_MPR_TOLERANCE) || dot1 < BT_MPR_TOLERANCE;
00287 }
00288 
00289 inline int portalCanEncapsuleOrigin(const btMprSimplex_t *portal,
00290                                          const btMprSupport_t *v4,
00291                                          const btVector3 *dir)
00292 {
00293     float dot;
00294     dot = btMprVec3Dot(&v4->v, dir);
00295     return btMprIsZero(dot) || dot > 0.f;
00296 }
00297 
00298 inline void btExpandPortal(btMprSimplex_t *portal,
00299                               const btMprSupport_t *v4)
00300 {
00301     float dot;
00302     btVector3 v4v0;
00303 
00304     btMprVec3Cross(&v4v0, &v4->v, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00305     dot = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v, &v4v0);
00306     if (dot > 0.f){
00307         dot = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v, &v4v0);
00308         if (dot > 0.f){
00309             btMprSimplexSet(portal, 1, v4);
00310         }else{
00311             btMprSimplexSet(portal, 3, v4);
00312         }
00313     }else{
00314         dot = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v, &v4v0);
00315         if (dot > 0.f){
00316             btMprSimplexSet(portal, 2, v4);
00317         }else{
00318             btMprSimplexSet(portal, 1, v4);
00319         }
00320     }
00321 }
00322 template <typename btConvexTemplate>
00323 inline void btMprSupport(const btConvexTemplate& a, const btConvexTemplate& b,
00324                          const btMprCollisionDescription& colDesc,
00325                                                                                                         const btVector3& dir, btMprSupport_t *supp)
00326 {
00327         btVector3 seperatingAxisInA = dir* a.getWorldTransform().getBasis();
00328         btVector3 seperatingAxisInB = -dir* b.getWorldTransform().getBasis();
00329 
00330         btVector3 pInA = a.getLocalSupportWithMargin(seperatingAxisInA);
00331         btVector3 qInB = b.getLocalSupportWithMargin(seperatingAxisInB);
00332 
00333         supp->v1 = a.getWorldTransform()(pInA);
00334         supp->v2 = b.getWorldTransform()(qInB);
00335         supp->v = supp->v1 - supp->v2;
00336 }
00337 
00338 
00339 template <typename btConvexTemplate>
00340 static int btDiscoverPortal(const btConvexTemplate& a, const btConvexTemplate& b,
00341                             const btMprCollisionDescription& colDesc,
00342                                                                                                         btMprSimplex_t *portal)
00343 {
00344     btVector3 dir, va, vb;
00345     float dot;
00346     int cont;
00347         
00348         
00349 
00350     // vertex 0 is center of portal
00351     btFindOrigin(a,b,colDesc, btMprSimplexPointW(portal, 0));
00352    
00353     
00354     // vertex 0 is center of portal
00355     btMprSimplexSetSize(portal, 1);
00356     
00357 
00358 
00359         btVector3 zero = btVector3(0,0,0);
00360         btVector3* org = &zero;
00361 
00362     if (btMprVec3Eq(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v, org)){
00363         // Portal's center lies on origin (0,0,0) => we know that objects
00364         // intersect but we would need to know penetration info.
00365         // So move center little bit...
00366         btMprVec3Set(&va, FLT_EPSILON * 10.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00367         btMprVec3Add(&btMprSimplexPointW(portal, 0)->v, &va);
00368     }
00369 
00370 
00371     // vertex 1 = support in direction of origin
00372     btMprVec3Copy(&dir, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00373     btMprVec3Scale(&dir, -1.f);
00374     btMprVec3Normalize(&dir);
00375 
00376 
00377     btMprSupport(a,b,colDesc, dir, btMprSimplexPointW(portal, 1));
00378  
00379     btMprSimplexSetSize(portal, 2);
00380 
00381     // test if origin isn't outside of v1
00382     dot = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v, &dir);
00383         
00384 
00385     if (btMprIsZero(dot) || dot < 0.f)
00386         return -1;
00387 
00388 
00389     // vertex 2
00390     btMprVec3Cross(&dir, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v,
00391                        &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);
00392     if (btMprIsZero(btMprVec3Len2(&dir))){
00393         if (btMprVec3Eq(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v, org)){
00394             // origin lies on v1
00395             return 1;
00396         }else{
00397             // origin lies on v0-v1 segment
00398             return 2;
00399         }
00400     }
00401 
00402     btMprVec3Normalize(&dir);
00403     btMprSupport(a,b,colDesc, dir, btMprSimplexPointW(portal, 2));
00404     
00405     
00406     
00407     dot = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v, &dir);
00408     if (btMprIsZero(dot) || dot < 0.f)
00409         return -1;
00410 
00411     btMprSimplexSetSize(portal, 3);
00412 
00413     // vertex 3 direction
00414     btMprVec3Sub2(&va, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,
00415                      &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00416     btMprVec3Sub2(&vb, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,
00417                      &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00418     btMprVec3Cross(&dir, &va, &vb);
00419     btMprVec3Normalize(&dir);
00420 
00421     // it is better to form portal faces to be oriented "outside" origin
00422     dot = btMprVec3Dot(&dir, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00423     if (dot > 0.f){
00424         btMprSimplexSwap(portal, 1, 2);
00425         btMprVec3Scale(&dir, -1.f);
00426     }
00427 
00428     while (btMprSimplexSize(portal) < 4){
00429                  btMprSupport(a,b,colDesc, dir, btMprSimplexPointW(portal, 3));
00430         
00431         dot = btMprVec3Dot(&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v, &dir);
00432         if (btMprIsZero(dot) || dot < 0.f)
00433             return -1;
00434 
00435         cont = 0;
00436 
00437         // test if origin is outside (v1, v0, v3) - set v2 as v3 and
00438         // continue
00439         btMprVec3Cross(&va, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,
00440                           &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v);
00441         dot = btMprVec3Dot(&va, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00442         if (dot < 0.f && !btMprIsZero(dot)){
00443             btMprSimplexSet(portal, 2, btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3));
00444             cont = 1;
00445         }
00446 
00447         if (!cont){
00448             // test if origin is outside (v3, v0, v2) - set v1 as v3 and
00449             // continue
00450             btMprVec3Cross(&va, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,
00451                               &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v);
00452             dot = btMprVec3Dot(&va, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00453             if (dot < 0.f && !btMprIsZero(dot)){
00454                 btMprSimplexSet(portal, 1, btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3));
00455                 cont = 1;
00456             }
00457         }
00458 
00459         if (cont){
00460             btMprVec3Sub2(&va, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,
00461                              &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00462             btMprVec3Sub2(&vb, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,
00463                              &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00464             btMprVec3Cross(&dir, &va, &vb);
00465             btMprVec3Normalize(&dir);
00466         }else{
00467             btMprSimplexSetSize(portal, 4);
00468         }
00469     }
00470 
00471     return 0;
00472 }
00473 
00474 template <typename btConvexTemplate>
00475 static int btRefinePortal(const btConvexTemplate& a, const btConvexTemplate& b,const btMprCollisionDescription& colDesc,
00476                                                         btMprSimplex_t *portal)
00477 {
00478     btVector3 dir;
00479     btMprSupport_t v4;
00480 
00481         for (int i=0;i<BT_MPR_MAX_ITERATIONS;i++)
00482     //while (1)
00483         {
00484         // compute direction outside the portal (from v0 throught v1,v2,v3
00485         // face)
00486         btPortalDir(portal, &dir);
00487 
00488         // test if origin is inside the portal
00489         if (portalEncapsulesOrigin(portal, &dir))
00490             return 0;
00491 
00492         // get next support point
00493         
00494                  btMprSupport(a,b,colDesc, dir, &v4);
00495 
00496 
00497         // test if v4 can expand portal to contain origin and if portal
00498         // expanding doesn't reach given tolerance
00499         if (!portalCanEncapsuleOrigin(portal, &v4, &dir)
00500                 || portalReachTolerance(portal, &v4, &dir))
00501                 {
00502             return -1;
00503         }
00504 
00505         // v1-v2-v3 triangle must be rearranged to face outside Minkowski
00506         // difference (direction from v0).
00507         btExpandPortal(portal, &v4);
00508     }
00509 
00510     return -1;
00511 }
00512 
00513 static void btFindPos(const btMprSimplex_t *portal, btVector3 *pos)
00514 {
00515 
00516         btVector3 zero = btVector3(0,0,0);
00517         btVector3* origin = &zero;
00518 
00519     btVector3 dir;
00520     size_t i;
00521     float b[4], sum, inv;
00522     btVector3 vec, p1, p2;
00523 
00524     btPortalDir(portal, &dir);
00525 
00526     // use barycentric coordinates of tetrahedron to find origin
00527     btMprVec3Cross(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,
00528                        &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v);
00529     b[0] = btMprVec3Dot(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v);
00530 
00531     btMprVec3Cross(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,
00532                        &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v);
00533     b[1] = btMprVec3Dot(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00534 
00535     btMprVec3Cross(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v,
00536                        &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);
00537     b[2] = btMprVec3Dot(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v);
00538 
00539     btMprVec3Cross(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,
00540                        &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);
00541     b[3] = btMprVec3Dot(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);
00542 
00543         sum = b[0] + b[1] + b[2] + b[3];
00544 
00545     if (btMprIsZero(sum) || sum < 0.f){
00546                 b[0] = 0.f;
00547 
00548         btMprVec3Cross(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,
00549                            &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v);
00550         b[1] = btMprVec3Dot(&vec, &dir);
00551         btMprVec3Cross(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,
00552                            &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);
00553         b[2] = btMprVec3Dot(&vec, &dir);
00554         btMprVec3Cross(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,
00555                            &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v);
00556         b[3] = btMprVec3Dot(&vec, &dir);
00557 
00558                 sum = b[1] + b[2] + b[3];
00559         }
00560 
00561         inv = 1.f / sum;
00562 
00563     btMprVec3Copy(&p1, origin);
00564     btMprVec3Copy(&p2, origin);
00565     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++){
00566         btMprVec3Copy(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, i)->v1);
00567         btMprVec3Scale(&vec, b[i]);
00568         btMprVec3Add(&p1, &vec);
00569 
00570         btMprVec3Copy(&vec, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, i)->v2);
00571         btMprVec3Scale(&vec, b[i]);
00572         btMprVec3Add(&p2, &vec);
00573     }
00574     btMprVec3Scale(&p1, inv);
00575     btMprVec3Scale(&p2, inv);
00576 #ifdef MPR_AVERAGE_CONTACT_POSITIONS
00577     btMprVec3Copy(pos, &p1);
00578     btMprVec3Add(pos, &p2);
00579     btMprVec3Scale(pos, 0.5);
00580 #else
00581     btMprVec3Copy(pos, &p2);
00582 #endif//MPR_AVERAGE_CONTACT_POSITIONS
00583 }
00584 
00585 inline float btMprVec3Dist2(const btVector3 *a, const btVector3 *b)
00586 {
00587     btVector3 ab;
00588     btMprVec3Sub2(&ab, a, b);
00589     return btMprVec3Len2(&ab);
00590 }
00591 
00592 inline float _btMprVec3PointSegmentDist2(const btVector3 *P,
00593                                                   const btVector3 *x0,
00594                                                   const btVector3 *b,
00595                                                   btVector3 *witness)
00596 {
00597     // The computation comes from solving equation of segment:
00598     //      S(t) = x0 + t.d
00599     //          where - x0 is initial point of segment
00600     //                - d is direction of segment from x0 (|d| > 0)
00601     //                - t belongs to <0, 1> interval
00602     // 
00603     // Than, distance from a segment to some point P can be expressed:
00604     //      D(t) = |x0 + t.d - P|^2
00605     //          which is distance from any point on segment. Minimization
00606     //          of this function brings distance from P to segment.
00607     // Minimization of D(t) leads to simple quadratic equation that's
00608     // solving is straightforward.
00609     //
00610     // Bonus of this method is witness point for free.
00611 
00612     float dist, t;
00613     btVector3 d, a;
00614 
00615     // direction of segment
00616     btMprVec3Sub2(&d, b, x0);
00617 
00618     // precompute vector from P to x0
00619     btMprVec3Sub2(&a, x0, P);
00620 
00621     t  = -1.f * btMprVec3Dot(&a, &d);
00622     t /= btMprVec3Len2(&d);
00623 
00624     if (t < 0.f || btMprIsZero(t)){
00625         dist = btMprVec3Dist2(x0, P);
00626         if (witness)
00627             btMprVec3Copy(witness, x0);
00628     }else if (t > 1.f || btMprEq(t, 1.f)){
00629         dist = btMprVec3Dist2(b, P);
00630         if (witness)
00631             btMprVec3Copy(witness, b);
00632     }else{
00633         if (witness){
00634             btMprVec3Copy(witness, &d);
00635             btMprVec3Scale(witness, t);
00636             btMprVec3Add(witness, x0);
00637             dist = btMprVec3Dist2(witness, P);
00638         }else{
00639             // recycling variables
00640             btMprVec3Scale(&d, t);
00641             btMprVec3Add(&d, &a);
00642             dist = btMprVec3Len2(&d);
00643         }
00644     }
00645 
00646     return dist;
00647 }
00648 
00649 
00650 
00651 inline float btMprVec3PointTriDist2(const btVector3 *P,
00652                                 const btVector3 *x0, const btVector3 *B,
00653                                 const btVector3 *C,
00654                                 btVector3 *witness)
00655 {
00656     // Computation comes from analytic expression for triangle (x0, B, C)
00657     //      T(s, t) = x0 + s.d1 + t.d2, where d1 = B - x0 and d2 = C - x0 and
00658     // Then equation for distance is:
00659     //      D(s, t) = | T(s, t) - P |^2
00660     // This leads to minimization of quadratic function of two variables.
00661     // The solution from is taken only if s is between 0 and 1, t is
00662     // between 0 and 1 and t + s < 1, otherwise distance from segment is
00663     // computed.
00664 
00665     btVector3 d1, d2, a;
00666     float u, v, w, p, q, r;
00667     float s, t, dist, dist2;
00668     btVector3 witness2;
00669 
00670     btMprVec3Sub2(&d1, B, x0);
00671     btMprVec3Sub2(&d2, C, x0);
00672     btMprVec3Sub2(&a, x0, P);
00673 
00674     u = btMprVec3Dot(&a, &a);
00675     v = btMprVec3Dot(&d1, &d1);
00676     w = btMprVec3Dot(&d2, &d2);
00677     p = btMprVec3Dot(&a, &d1);
00678     q = btMprVec3Dot(&a, &d2);
00679     r = btMprVec3Dot(&d1, &d2);
00680 
00681         btScalar div = (w * v - r * r);
00682         if (btMprIsZero(div))
00683         {
00684                 s=-1;
00685         } else
00686         {
00687                 s = (q * r - w * p) / div;
00688                 t = (-s * r - q) / w;
00689         }
00690 
00691     if ((btMprIsZero(s) || s > 0.f)
00692             && (btMprEq(s, 1.f) || s < 1.f)
00693             && (btMprIsZero(t) || t > 0.f)
00694             && (btMprEq(t, 1.f) || t < 1.f)
00695             && (btMprEq(t + s, 1.f) || t + s < 1.f)){
00696 
00697         if (witness){
00698             btMprVec3Scale(&d1, s);
00699             btMprVec3Scale(&d2, t);
00700             btMprVec3Copy(witness, x0);
00701             btMprVec3Add(witness, &d1);
00702             btMprVec3Add(witness, &d2);
00703 
00704             dist = btMprVec3Dist2(witness, P);
00705         }else{
00706             dist  = s * s * v;
00707             dist += t * t * w;
00708             dist += 2.f * s * t * r;
00709             dist += 2.f * s * p;
00710             dist += 2.f * t * q;
00711             dist += u;
00712         }
00713     }else{
00714         dist = _btMprVec3PointSegmentDist2(P, x0, B, witness);
00715 
00716         dist2 = _btMprVec3PointSegmentDist2(P, x0, C, &witness2);
00717         if (dist2 < dist){
00718             dist = dist2;
00719             if (witness)
00720                 btMprVec3Copy(witness, &witness2);
00721         }
00722 
00723         dist2 = _btMprVec3PointSegmentDist2(P, B, C, &witness2);
00724         if (dist2 < dist){
00725             dist = dist2;
00726             if (witness)
00727                 btMprVec3Copy(witness, &witness2);
00728         }
00729     }
00730 
00731     return dist;
00732 }
00733 
00734 template <typename btConvexTemplate>
00735 static void btFindPenetr(const btConvexTemplate& a, const btConvexTemplate& b,
00736                          const btMprCollisionDescription& colDesc,
00737                          btMprSimplex_t *portal,
00738                          float *depth, btVector3 *pdir, btVector3 *pos)
00739 {
00740     btVector3 dir;
00741     btMprSupport_t v4;
00742     unsigned long iterations;
00743 
00744         btVector3 zero = btVector3(0,0,0);
00745         btVector3* origin = &zero;
00746 
00747 
00748     iterations = 1UL;
00749         for (int i=0;i<BT_MPR_MAX_ITERATIONS;i++)
00750     //while (1)
00751         {
00752         // compute portal direction and obtain next support point
00753         btPortalDir(portal, &dir);
00754         
00755                  btMprSupport(a,b,colDesc, dir, &v4);
00756 
00757 
00758         // reached tolerance -> find penetration info
00759         if (portalReachTolerance(portal, &v4, &dir)
00760                 || iterations ==BT_MPR_MAX_ITERATIONS)
00761                 {
00762             *depth = btMprVec3PointTriDist2(origin,&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,&btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,pdir);
00763             *depth = BT_MPR_SQRT(*depth);
00764                         
00765                         if (btMprIsZero((*pdir).x()) && btMprIsZero((*pdir).y()) && btMprIsZero((*pdir).z()))
00766                         {
00767                                 
00768                                 *pdir = dir;
00769                         } 
00770                         btMprVec3Normalize(pdir);
00771                         
00772             // barycentric coordinates:
00773             btFindPos(portal, pos);
00774 
00775 
00776             return;
00777         }
00778 
00779         btExpandPortal(portal, &v4);
00780 
00781         iterations++;
00782     }
00783 }
00784 
00785 static void btFindPenetrTouch(btMprSimplex_t *portal,float *depth, btVector3 *dir, btVector3 *pos)
00786 {
00787     // Touching contact on portal's v1 - so depth is zero and direction
00788     // is unimportant and pos can be guessed
00789     *depth = 0.f;
00790     btVector3 zero = btVector3(0,0,0);
00791         btVector3* origin = &zero;
00792 
00793 
00794         btMprVec3Copy(dir, origin);
00795 #ifdef MPR_AVERAGE_CONTACT_POSITIONS
00796     btMprVec3Copy(pos, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v1);
00797     btMprVec3Add(pos, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v2);
00798     btMprVec3Scale(pos, 0.5);
00799 #else
00800      btMprVec3Copy(pos, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v2);
00801 #endif
00802 }
00803 
00804 static void btFindPenetrSegment(btMprSimplex_t *portal,
00805                               float *depth, btVector3 *dir, btVector3 *pos)
00806 {
00807     
00808     // Origin lies on v0-v1 segment.
00809     // Depth is distance to v1, direction also and position must be
00810     // computed
00811 #ifdef MPR_AVERAGE_CONTACT_POSITIONS
00812     btMprVec3Copy(pos, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v1);
00813     btMprVec3Add(pos, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v2);
00814     btMprVec3Scale(pos, 0.5f);
00815 #else
00816      btMprVec3Copy(pos, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v2);
00817 #endif//MPR_AVERAGE_CONTACT_POSITIONS
00818 
00819     btMprVec3Copy(dir, &btMprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);
00820     *depth = BT_MPR_SQRT(btMprVec3Len2(dir));
00821     btMprVec3Normalize(dir);
00822 
00823     
00824 }
00825 
00826 
00827 template <typename btConvexTemplate>
00828 inline int btMprPenetration( const btConvexTemplate& a, const btConvexTemplate& b,
00829                             const btMprCollisionDescription& colDesc,
00830                                         float *depthOut, btVector3* dirOut, btVector3* posOut)
00831 {
00832         
00833          btMprSimplex_t portal;
00834 
00835 
00836     // Phase 1: Portal discovery
00837     int result = btDiscoverPortal(a,b,colDesc, &portal);
00838         
00839           
00840         //sepAxis[pairIndex] = *pdir;//or -dir?
00841 
00842         switch (result)
00843         {
00844         case 0:
00845                 {
00846                         // Phase 2: Portal refinement
00847                 
00848                         result = btRefinePortal(a,b,colDesc, &portal);
00849                         if (result < 0)
00850                                 return -1;
00851 
00852                         // Phase 3. Penetration info
00853                         btFindPenetr(a,b,colDesc, &portal, depthOut, dirOut, posOut);
00854                         
00855                         
00856                         break;
00857                 }
00858         case 1:
00859                 {
00860                          // Touching contact on portal's v1.
00861                         btFindPenetrTouch(&portal, depthOut, dirOut, posOut);
00862                         result=0;
00863                         break;
00864                 }
00865         case 2:
00866                 {
00867                         
00868                         btFindPenetrSegment( &portal, depthOut, dirOut, posOut);
00869                         result=0;
00870                         break;
00871                 }
00872         default:
00873                 {
00874                         //if (res < 0)
00875                         //{
00876                                 // Origin isn't inside portal - no collision.
00877                                 result = -1;
00878                         //}
00879                 }
00880         };
00881         
00882         return result;
00883 };
00884 
00885 
00886 template<typename btConvexTemplate, typename btMprDistanceTemplate>
00887 inline int      btComputeMprPenetration( const btConvexTemplate& a, const btConvexTemplate& b, const
00888                                     btMprCollisionDescription& colDesc, btMprDistanceTemplate* distInfo)
00889 {
00890         btVector3 dir,pos;
00891         float depth;
00892 
00893         int res = btMprPenetration(a,b,colDesc,&depth, &dir, &pos);
00894         if (res==0)
00895         {
00896                 distInfo->m_distance = -depth;
00897                 distInfo->m_pointOnB = pos;
00898                 distInfo->m_normalBtoA = -dir;
00899                 distInfo->m_pointOnA = pos-distInfo->m_distance*dir;
00900                 return 0;
00901         }
00902 
00903         return -1;
00904 }
